title: Raffaella – BLONDE (live for The Current)
description:
During a visit to The Current, new-to-Minneapolis singer Raffaella performed music from her recent EP, "Live, Raff, Love (Act 1)." Stripped down to just guitar, bass, and drums, the three-song performance included this rendition of Raffaella's song, "BLONDE." 

Guest: Raffaella
Video: Evan Clark
Audio: Derek Ramirez
Host and Producer: Diane

Band members:
Raffaella - voice
Sara L'Abriola - guitar
Megan Mahoney - bass
Joey Hayes - Drums

title: The Heavy Heavy – three-song performance at The Current
description:
While on tour across the United States, U.K. band The Heavy Heavy were living a real-life version of their hit song ‘Miles and Miles’ when they visited The Current studio for a session hosted by Ayisha Jaffer.

Blending elements of ‘60s folk, cosmic Americana and good-old rock and roll, The Heavy Heavy performed a lively set in the studio. Watch and listen to their three-song performance above.

Don't miss the band's complete session and interview with host Ayisha Jaffer, posted here: https://www.thecurrent.org/feature/2022/11/30/watch-the-heavy-heavy-performing-in-the-current-studio

Songs played:
00:00:00 Miles and Miles
00:03:27 Go Down River
00:07:40 All My Dreams

The Heavy Heavy are:
William Turner, guitar and vocals
Georgie Fuller: keys and vocals
Frank Fogden: guitar and vocals
Tom Holder: bass and vocals
James Porter: drums

Credits
Guests – @TheHeavyHeavyBand 
Host – Ayisha Jaffer
Producer – Derrick Stevens
Video – Evan Clark
Camera Operators – Evan Clark, Peter Ecklund
Audio – Cameron Wiley
Graphics – Natalia Toledo
Digital Producer – Luke Taylor
